item.name: MongoDB::CACHE_BYTES_READ_INTO
item.description: Amount of bytes in the WiredTiger storage engine cache and tickets found in the wiredTiger.cache and wiredTiger.concurrentTransactions documents that the serverStatus command generates.

item.name: MongoDB::CACHE_BYTES_WRITTEN_FROM
item.description: Amount of bytes in the WiredTiger storage engine cache and tickets found in the wiredTiger.cache and wiredTiger.concurrentTransactions documents that the serverStatus command generates.

item.name: MongoDB::CACHE_DIRTY_BYTES
item.description: Amount of bytes in the WiredTiger storage engine cache and tickets found in the wiredTiger.cache and wiredTiger.concurrentTransactions documents that the serverStatus command generates.

item.name: MongoDB::CACHE_USED_BYTES
item.description: Amount of bytes in the WiredTiger storage engine cache and tickets found in the wiredTiger.cache and wiredTiger.concurrentTransactions documents that the serverStatus command generates.

item.name: MongoDB::CONNECTIONS
item.description: Number of connections to a MongoDB process found in the connections document that the serverStatus command generates.

item.name: MongoDB::CURSORS_TOTAL_OPEN
item.description: Number of cursors for a MongoDB process found in the metrics.cursor document that the serverStatus command generates.

item.name: MongoDB::CURSORS_TOTAL_TIMED_OUT
item.description: Number of cursors for a MongoDB process found in the metrics.cursor document that the serverStatus command generates.

item.name: MongoDB::DB_DATA_SIZE_TOTAL
item.description: Number of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started.

item.name: MongoDB::DB_STORAGE_TOTAL
item.description: Number of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_IOPS_READ
item.description: Measures throughput of I/O operations for the disk partition used for MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_IOPS_TOTAL
item.description: Measures throughput of I/O operations for the disk partition used for MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_IOPS_WRITE
item.description: Measures throughput of I/O operations for the disk partition used for MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_LATENCY_READ
item.description: Measures latency per operation type of the disk partition used by MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_LATENCY_WRITE
item.description: Measures latency per operation type of the disk partition used by MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_SPACE_FREE
item.description: Measures the free disk space and used disk space on the disk partition used by MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_SPACE_PERCENT_FREE
item.description: Measures the free disk space and used disk space on the disk partition used by MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_SPACE_PERCENT_USED
item.description: Measures the free disk space and used disk space on the disk partition used by MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_SPACE_USED
item.description: Measures the free disk space and used disk space on the disk partition used by MongoDB.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_PARTITION_UTILIZATION
item.description: The percentage of time during which requests are being issued to and serviced by the partition. This includes requests from any process, not just MongoDB processes.

item.name: MongoDB::DISK_TOTAL_IOPS
item.description: Total number of IOPS for serwers

item.name: MongoDB::GLOBAL_LOCK_CURRENT_QUEUE_READERS
item.description: Number of operations waiting on locks for the MongoDB process that the serverStatus command generates. Cloud Manager computes these values based on the type of storage engine.

item.name: MongoDB::GLOBAL_LOCK_CURRENT_QUEUE_TOTAL
item.description: Number of operations waiting on locks for the MongoDB process that the serverStatus command generates. Cloud Manager computes these values based on the type of storage engine.

item.name: MongoDB::GLOBAL_LOCK_CURRENT_QUEUE_WRITERS
item.description: Number of operations waiting on locks for the MongoDB process that the serverStatus command generates. Cloud Manager computes these values based on the type of storage engine.

item.name: MongoDB::MEMORY_MAPPED
item.description: Amount of memory for a MongoDB process found in the mem document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::MEMORY_RESIDENT
item.description: Amount of memory for a MongoDB process found in the mem document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::MEMORY_VIRTUAL
item.description: Amount of memory for a MongoDB process found in the mem document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::NETWORK_BYTES_IN
item.description: Amount of throughput for MongoDB process found in the network document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::NETWORK_BYTES_OUT
item.description: Amount of throughput for MongoDB process found in the network document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::NETWORK_NUM_REQUESTS
item.description: Amount of throughput for MongoDB process found in the network document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_CMD
item.description: Rate of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started found in the opcounters document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_DELETE
item.description: Rate of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started found in the opcounters document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_GETMORE
item.description: Rate of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started found in the opcounters document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_INSERT
item.description: Rate of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started found in the opcounters document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_QUERY
item.description: Rate of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started found in the opcounters document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_REPL_CMD
item.description: Rate of database operations on MongoDB secondaries found in the opcountersRepl document that the serverStatus command collects

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_REPL_DELETE
item.description: Rate of database operations on MongoDB secondaries found in the opcountersRepl document that the serverStatus command collects

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_REPL_INSERT
item.description: Rate of database operations on MongoDB secondaries found in the opcountersRepl document that the serverStatus command collects

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_REPL_UPDATE
item.description: Rate of database operations on MongoDB secondaries found in the opcountersRepl document that the serverStatus command collects

item.name: MongoDB::OPCOUNTER_UPDATE
item.description: Rate of database operations on a MongoDB process since the process last started found in the opcounters document that the serverStatus command collects.

item.name: MongoDB::OPERATIONS_SCAN_AND_ORDER
item.description: Average rate for operations per second during a selected time period that perform a sort but cannot perform the sort using an index.

item.name: MongoDB::OPLOG_MASTER_LAG_TIME_DIFF
item.description: Durations and throughput of the MongoDB process' oplog.

item.name: MongoDB::OPLOG_MASTER_TIME
item.description: Durations and throughput of the MongoDB process' oplog.

item.name: MongoDB::OPLOG_RATE_GB_PER_HOUR
item.description: Durations and throughput of the MongoDB process' oplog.

item.name: MongoDB::OPLOG_SLAVE_LAG_MASTER_TIME
item.description: Durations and throughput of the MongoDB process' oplog.

item.name: MongoDB::OP_EXECUTION_TIME_COMMANDS
item.description: Average execution time in milliseconds per read, write, or command operation during a selected time period.

item.name: MongoDB::OP_EXECUTION_TIME_READS
item.description: Average execution time in milliseconds per read, write, or command operation during a selected time period.

item.name: MongoDB::OP_EXECUTION_TIME_WRITES
item.description: Average execution time in milliseconds per read, write, or command operation during a selected time period.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_CPU_CHILDREN_KERNEL
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage. For hosts with more than one CPU core, these values can exceed 100%.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_CPU_CHILDREN_USER
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage. For hosts with more than one CPU core, these values can exceed 100%.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_CPU_KERNEL
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage. For hosts with more than one CPU core, these values can exceed 100%.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_CPU_USER
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage. For hosts with more than one CPU core, these values can exceed 100%.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_NORMALIZED_CPU_CHILDREN_KERNEL
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage scaled to a range of 0% to 100%. Atlas computes this value by dividing by the number of CPU cores.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_NORMALIZED_CPU_CHILDREN_USER
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage scaled to a range of 0% to 100%. Atlas computes this value by dividing by the number of CPU cores.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_NORMALIZED_CPU_KERNEL
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage scaled to a range of 0% to 100%. Atlas computes this value by dividing by the number of CPU cores.

item.name: MongoDB::PROCESS_NORMALIZED_CPU_USER
item.description: MongoDB CPU usage scaled to a range of 0% to 100%. Atlas computes this value by dividing by the number of CPU cores.

item.name: MongoDB::QUERY_EXECUTOR_SCANNED
item.description: Average rate per second to scan index items during queries and query-plan evaluations found in the value of totalKeysExamined from the explain command.

item.name: MongoDB::QUERY_EXECUTOR_SCANNED_OBJECTS
item.description: Average rate of documents scanned per second during queries and query-plan evaluations found in the value of totalDocsExamined from the explain command.

item.name: MongoDB::QUERY_TARGETING_SCANNED_OBJECTS_PER_RETURNED
item.description: Ratio of the number of documents scanned to the number of documents returned.

item.name: MongoDB::QUERY_TARGETING_SCANNED_PER_RETURNED
item.description: Ratio of the number of index items scanned to the number of documents returned.

item.name: MongoDB::REPLIKASET_LAST_PING
item.description: Check lastping state from atlas

trigger.name: Last ping from MongoAtlas is to long
trigger.description: Last ping from mongo is more than 10 minutes

trigger.name: MongoAtlas primary state was changed
trigger.description: Check change between primary and secondary state

item.name: MongoDB::SWAP_IO_IN

item.description: Total amount of memory written and read from swap.

item.name: MongoDB::SWAP_USAGE_FREE
item.description: Total amount of memory that swap uses.

item.name: MongoDB::SWAP_USAGE_USED
item.description: Total amount of memory that swap uses.
